protein.specific_function: Able to phosphorylate CDKN1B in vitro. Involved in cell cycle progression and suppression of apoptosis. Implicated in proliferation of human hepatoma cell lines

reference.reference_text: Fujii C, Nakamoto Y, Lu P, Tsuneyama K, Popivanova BK, Kaneko S, Mukaida N: Aberrant expression of serine/threonine kinase Pim-3 in hepatocellular carcinoma development and its role in the proliferation of human hepatoma cell lines. Int J Cancer. 2005 Mar 20;114(2):209-18.
